video.title: Chasing Shackleton
video.synopsis: Modern-day explorers re-create Sir Ernest Shackleton's 1914 Antarctic expedition, during which the crew became shipwrecked and stranded for 500 days.

episodes.synopsis: Environmental scientist Tim Jarvis leads a team of experts in a re-creation of Ernest Shackleton's disastrous 1914 Trans-Antarctic Expedition.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Using 100-year-old equipment, Jarvis and his team attempt to cross the Southern Ocean in a replica of Shackleton's 22-foot lifeboat.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis and his team wrestle with the climate, illness and more as they cross the mountains of South Georgia in the last leg of their trek.
episodes.title: Episode 3
